text: Matthew Joseph Servitto (born April 7, 1965) is an American actor. He is best known for his role as FBI agent Dwight Harris in the HBO crime drama The Sopranos (1999–2007). His other television roles include Trask Bodine in All My Children (1989–1990), Donald Donatelle in Brotherhood (2006–2008) and Brock Lotus in Banshee (2013–2016). He has also appeared in movies such as Two Family House (2000) and Hitch (2005). Servitto was born in Teaneck, New Jersey. He is a graduate of the Juilliard School in New York City. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:People from Teaneck, New Jersey
title: Matt Servitto
